item.title: By: robert
item.dc:creator: robert
item.description: Its part of the NODE_ENV which the grunt-env plugin parses. Other than that I am not totally sure how it is doing it.
item.content:encoded: Its part of the NODE_ENV which the grunt-env plugin parses. Other than that I am not totally sure how it is doing it.

item.title: By: Amp
item.dc:creator: Amp
item.description:
Hi,
Thanks for the amazing article. A quick question on the below line:
<code><-- @if NODE_ENV == 'DEVELOPMENT' --></code>
Is this (<code><!-- @if .... --></code>) specific to nodejs or part of regular JS apart from NODE_ENV. Any reference?
Thanks, Amp
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Thanks for the amazing article.
A quick question on the below line:

<-- @if NODE_ENV == 'DEVELOPMENT' -->

Is this (<!-- @if .... -->) specific to nodejs or part of regular JS apart from NODE_ENV.
Any reference?

Thanks,
Amp
